subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In their own aggressive ways, with the same mandate to win, if disparate budgets to do it, Omar Minaya and Billy Beane have dared to become baseball’s prom king slayers.
snippet: In their own aggressive ways, with the same mandate to win, if disparate budgets to do it, Omar Minaya and Billy Beane have dared to become baseball’s prom king slayers.
